param.name: system.mysql.db.host
param.spec: text description='MySQL hostname (if empty - `localhost` will be used)' display='normal' label='MySQL hostname:' validationMode='any'

param.name: system.mysql.db.user
param.spec: text description='MySQL username (if empty - `root` will be used)' display='normal' label='MySQL username:' validationMode='any'

param.name: system.mysql.db.password
param.spec: password description='MySQL password' display='normal' label='MySQL Password:' validationMode='any'

param.name: system.mysql.db.name
param.spec: text description='MySQL DB name' display='normal' label='MySQL DB name:' validationMode='not_empty'

param.name: system.sql.before
param.spec: text description='Set SQL before deploy a sql dump file' label='SQL before dump:' validationMode='any'

param.name: system.sql.dump
param.spec: text description='SQL dump file location (http or local FS)' label='SQL dump:' validationMode='not_empty'

param.name: system.sql.after
param.spec: text description='Set SQL after deploy a sql dump file' label='SQL after dump:' validationMode='any'

parameters.param:
<project name="Run restore Mysql dump"> <condition property="mysql.host" value="${mysql.db.host}" else="localhost"> <matches pattern=".+" string="${mysql.db.host}"/> </condition> <condition property="mysql.user" value="${mysql.db.user}" else="root"> <matches pattern=".+" string="${mysql.db.user}"/> </condition> <condition property="mysql.password.set"> <matches pattern=".+" string="${mysql.db.password}"/> </condition>
<property name="mysql.conf" value="${teamcity.build.tempDir}/my.cnf" /> <condition property="mysql.exec.params" value="--defaults-file=${mysql.conf} -D ${mysql.db.name} " else="-u${mysql.user} -h${mysql.host} -D ${mysql.db.name} "> <matches pattern=".+" string="${mysql.db.password}" /> </condition>
<condition property="sql.before.set"> <matches pattern=".+" string="${sql.before}"/> </condition>
<condition property="sql.after.set"> <matches pattern=".+" string="${sql.after}"/> </condition>
<condition property="sql.dump.remote"> <matches pattern="://" string="${sql.dump}"/> </condition>
<condition property="sql.dump.file" value="${teamcity.build.tempDir}/mysql.dump.sql" else="${sql.dump}"> <istrue value="${sql.dump.remote}" /> </condition> <target name="runMysql" depends="execSqlBefore,execSqlDump,execSqlAfter" />
<target name="createMysqlConf" if="${mysql.password.set}"> <echo file="${mysql.conf}" append="false">[mysql] user = ${mysql.user} password = ${mysql.db.password} host = ${mysql.host} </echo> </target>
<target name="execSqlBefore" depends="createMysqlConf" if="${sql.before.set}"> <exec executable="mysql"> <arg line="${mysql.exec.params} -e "/> <arg value="${sql.before}"/> </exec> </target>
<target name="execSqlAfter" depends="execSqlDump" if="${sql.after.set}"> <exec executable="mysql"> <arg line="${mysql.exec.params} -e "/> <arg value="${sql.after}"/> </exec> </target>
<target name="execSqlDump" depends="execSqlBefore,createMysqlConf,getDumpFile"> <exec executable="mysql" input="${sql.dump.file}"> <arg line="${mysql.exec.params}" /> </exec> </target>
<target name="getDumpFile" if="sql.dump.remote"> <get src="${sql.dump}" dest="${sql.dump.file}" verbose="on" skipexisting="false"/> </target>
</project>
